document.text:
From: 
To: 
Subject: RE: Request for Tangible and Documentary Evidence (Touhy Request); Jane Doe v. Indyke et al., 
SDNY Case No. I :20-cv-00484-JGK-DCF 
Date: Tue, 30 Jun 2020 20:25:32 +0000 
No problem! Good luck with everything. I don't think there's any hard deadline on the request because we're not in court 
and they didn't send a subpoena. So the main constraint is Glassman's annoyance. I wrote him a brief note back last night, 
although I doubt that will keep him happy for very long. I try not to provide specific timelines on stuff like this, but if we 
need too much more time I can try letting him know a more specific sense of timing. Thanks! 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, June 30, 2020 1:38 PM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Request for Tangible and Documentary Evidence (Touhy Request); Jane Doe v. Indyke et al., SDNY Case No. 
1:20-cv-00484-JGK-DCF 
Hey I apologize for the delay â€”  our entire team has been absolutely swamped for the past two weeks; we indicted 
Ghislaine Maxwell yesterday and now are working on arrest plans, and it's been insane. I very much hope to be able to 
take care of this next week, it's just been one thing after another for a little while. 
From: 
Sent: Sunday, June 28, 2020 23:06 
To: 
Subject: Fwd: Request for Tangible and Documentary Evidence (Touhy Request); Jane Doe v. Indyke et al., SDNY Case No. 
1:20-cv-00484-JGK-DCF 
Hi M, 
Just checking in on thisâ€”do you think it will be possible to gather the materials this week? I will write Glassman back and 
tell him that I hope to follow up soon. 
Thanks, 
Sent from my iPhone 
Begin forwarded message: 
From: Robert Glassman 
Date: June 26, 2020 at 12:49:19 AM EDT 
To: (USANYS)" 
Cc:" "Nathan Werksman" 
>, Keilah Betts < 
Subject: Re: Request for Tangible and Documentary Evidence (Touhy Request); Jane Doe v. Indyke et al., SDNY Case 
No. 1:20-cv-00484-1GK-DCF 
Mr. 
S I am following up on my client's request. It would mean a lot for your office to do what it can to see that 
her request is complied with in an expedient manner. Thank you. 
EFTA00030341

Robert S. Glassman 
Panish Shea & Boyle 
psblaw.com 
On Jun 8, 2020, at 4:19 PM, (USANYS) 
Dear Mr. Glassman, 
Thank you for your letter. I will follow up. 
Thanks, 
From: Robert Glassman 
Sent: Monday, June 8, 2020 3:08 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Betts < 
Subject: Request for Tangible and Documentary 
1:20-cv-00484-JGK-DCF 
Importance: High 
< wrote: 
;  Nathan Werksman Keilah 
Evidence (Touhy Request); Jane Doe v. Indyke et al., SDNY Case No. 
Dear Mr. 
Please see the attached letter of today's date. A copy will also be sent via Fedex. 
Robert Glassman 
Robert Glassman, Esq. 
Panish Shea & Boyle LLP 
Los Angeles, CA 90025 
Email: 
Web: www.psblaw.com 
Thank you. 
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: 
This e-mail may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient(s). Any review, use, 
distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient (or authorized to receive for the 
recipient), please contact the sender by reply e-mail or telephone, and delete all copies of this message. 
If you are a potential client, the information you disclose to us by email will be kept in strict confidence and will be protected to 
the full extent of the law. Please be advised, however, that Panish Shea & Boyle LLP and its lawyers do not represent you until you 
have signed a retainer agreement with the firm. Until that time, you are responsible for any statutes of limitations or other 
deadlines for your case or potential case. 
EFTA00030342
